description: Deep integration with ADGA so you can sync owned goats, registration details, and related goats with a click instead of manual data entry.

subFeatures.description: Automatically generated, consistent pages for each goat in your herd, powered by synced registration and pedigree data.
Gestation calculator tailored for dairy goats so you can plan kidding dates directly alongside your herd data.

description: Real-time preview of your public website as you edit content so you can catch layout and content issues before publishing.

subFeatures.description: Live preview continues to function even without an active internet connection so you can keep editing anywhere.

subFeatures.feature: Live preview with GFM Markdown support
subFeatures.description: GitHub Flavored Markdown is rendered locally so you can write content in Markdown and see the exact result in the preview.

description: Core editing experience and preview keep working without a network connection so you can update your site from the barn or the road.

subFeatures.description: Minimizes network usage by syncing only when needed (such as ADGA syncs and publishing).

description: Pages are rendered in a search-engine-friendly way so more people can discover your herd.

subFeatures.description: SEO best practices like titles, descriptions, and structured markup are handled for you out of the box.
Goat and farm pages include Open Graph metadata so shared links look great on social media.
Automatically notifies supported search engines when pages are updated so your site stays fresh in results.

description: First-class support for popular analytics tools so you can understand how visitors use your site.

subFeatures.description: Easily integrate Google Analytics to track visitor behavior and site performance.
Support for privacy-centric analytics tools that respect visitor data and comply with regulations.

description: Compose content using GitHub Flavored Markdown for a fast, keyboard-friendly writing experience.
Single Page Application design keeps navigation snappy after the initial load while still playing nicely with SEO.

subFeatures.description: Lazy loading and image optimization ensure goat photos load quickly without sacrificing quality.

description: Pages across your site share a cohesive layout tuned for dairy goat farms, reducing the chance of broken or inconsistent designs.
Platform updates and improvements are rolled out automatically so you always have the latest features without manual maintenance.
Your farm website focuses entirely on your herd, with no third-party ads.
DigiGoat is open source and shaped by real dairy goat farms, so you can review the features and help guide the roadmap.

subFeatures.description: The entire codebase is public, giving you transparency into how your site works.
New features and improvements are prioritized based on feedback from the dairy goat community.

description: Designed by and for dairy goat farms, with human, farm-aware support when you need help.

subFeatures.feature: For Dairy Goat Farms, By a Dairy Goat Farm
subFeatures.description: Built around ADGA and CDCB data and the real workflows of working dairy goat farms.
Smart suggestions for things like barn names and starter website copy so you spend less time on repetitive details.
Support from someone who can remember your farm and setup instead of a generic call center.

description: Use a custom domain and matching email addresses so your farm looks professional online.

subFeatures.description: Own a dedicated URL like www.yourfarm.com instead of a generic subdomain.
Create farm-branded email addresses (for example, info@yourfarm.com) tied to your domain.

description: Straightforward pricing tailored for working farms, with additional discounts for youth projects.

subFeatures.description: Flat annual fee with no surprise charges or addons.
Discounted pricing to make DigiGoat more accessible for 4-H and youth dairy goat projects.
